p: The data presented are representative of at least three independent experiments. For all data, n corresponds to the number of independent experiments. Real-time PCR and cell viability assays and ELISA measurements were carried out in triplicate in each independent experiments. Statistical analysis was performed using SPSS software (IBM Corporation, Armonk, NY, USA). Statistical significance was determined by Kruskal-Wallis one-way ANOVA non-parametric test using pairwise comparisons [ 33]. Data are shown as mean ± standard deviation (SD). The difference between means was determined at 95% confidence intervals. Statistical significance was set at p value < 0.05 .
